Se cumple un año de la partida del sensei Akira Toriyama 💔
Y que mejor momento para recordar uno de los días mas impactantes de toda mi vida: cuando visité su estudio y casa en Nagoya, Japón poquito después de su muerte.

Quizá algunos no lo puedan comprender, pero llegar ahí fue de las cosas más emocionantes que hice en mi vida. Es muy difícil de explicar... 🤯
Un sueño hecho realidad. Y como siempre digo, sueñen con cuidado, ¡porque podría volverse realidad! 🙏

《混沌少年時》 (Adolescence)每一集都是一鏡到底、每一個演員都是一時之選。這部被譽為「十幾年來最接近完美的電視劇集」透過一個 13 歲少年的處境，逼我們直視當代社會一場又一場的惡夢。

🔻 今年最壓迫也最值得的四個小時？

清晨六點十五分，警察攻破了 13 歲的少年 Jamie 的家並將其以涉嫌謀殺的罪名逮捕；這就是《混沌少年時》的主線劇情。一共四集、每集一小時、每一個小時都是一鏡到底，講述這個跨越 13 個月的悲慘故事。

「用 13 個月當中的四天、四天當中各取一小時講好一個複雜又龐大的故事」聽起來不可思議，然而他們不僅做到了，還做得比近年幾乎所有大製作都更細膩。透過每一集只聚焦一個空間（警局、學校、青少年精神病院、家庭）一步步剖析這場悲劇的始末：第一集冷峻又客觀地鋪陳並引爆事件、第二集描繪了同儕霸凌和網路世代的毫無隱私、第三集揭開了社會中有毒的男子氣概和「紅色藥丸」如何扭曲一位男孩、第四集則回到家庭如何承受事件本身的標籤和偏見並獨留一片心碎；所有社會瘡疤竟然在短短四集的一鏡到底限制之下無所遁形。

🔻 所以一鏡到底到底拍了幾次？

如果你也和我們一樣一開始都覺得一定多少有透過剪接才完成這四集的內容，那你錯了。根據導演和製作團隊的訪談透露最新的技術和特別的拍攝手法，穿越門廊窗框、上下車、攝影機轉成空拍機都是真的一鏡到底，沒有剪接，因此每一集都預留了一週的排練和五天的拍攝時間：

讓人驚訝的是第一集的警察突襲和警局的審訊在第一天的第二次拍攝就拍到了可以用的版本，效率與專業讓人結舌。第二集動輒整個校園、追焦多位學生、最後更包含從學校無縫至在案發現場獻花的父親特寫則拍攝了十三次。第三集雖然聚焦在 Jamie 和心理學家的對談，然而整整一小時的對白和高漲的情緒，最終拍攝了十一次才完成。第四集作為集大成之作，情緒之強烈又包含多個開車的鏡頭，則在第十六次拍攝替整部劇做了最完美（也最心碎）的收尾。

🔻 你可以說他在炫技，卻是不著痕跡！

對於這個拍攝手法，導演 Philip Barantini 早已在他的上一部作品《餐廳失控夜》(Boiling Point) 展示過他的能力；因此也有一派聲音認為這些一鏡到底的鏡頭不免讓人感到炫技。然而正是這些「一鏡到底」留下的其餘空白（跨度十三個月，卻只聚焦在其中四個小時），讓人更能沈浸在每一個角色在一小時當中，每一次細微的心理變化 —— 尤其是第三集當中最為強烈 —— 也更能感受事件發生當下身邊的種種。

場面調度、規劃、走位之精細，加上演員的演技連貫又精湛，很多人甚至看完第一集的最後才發現原來從頭到尾都是一鏡到底。

🔻 男主角竟然是第一次演戲！

「我才 13 歲，我看起來應該沒那麼可怕。真是丟臉，竟然害怕一個 13 歲少年。」 若你看了《混沌少年時》 (Adolescence) 絕對都會認同演員演技全員在線，然而飾演 Jamie 的 Owen Cooper 絕對最讓人印象深刻。尤其第三集中，前一刻還像個少年輕鬆地聊著三明治和摘香蕉的話題，下一秒則立刻引爆的情緒和怒氣，卻又在兒童心理學家短暫外出又回歸後迅速校正的狀態 (留下眼神中讓人不安的情緒) 實在令人驚艷。

然而更讓人意外的，是第三集是全劇拍攝的第一場戲。而《混沌少年時》作為年僅 14 歲的 Owen Cooper 第一次的戲劇演出，也代表這場戲是他人生中第一次拍戲！當然這也部份歸功於和他搭戲的演員 Erin Doherty 的成熟的功力，然而無疑的是 Owen Cooper 絕對是影壇的下一顆星；觀影過程更是不時閃現年輕的李奧納多在《全蝕狂愛》(Total Eclipse) 的邪魅與純真，前途不可限量。而他的下一部作品則即將演出《花漾女子》導演 Emerald Fennell 的新版《咆哮山莊》，並飾演年輕的希斯克利夫 (長大版則是 Jacob Elordi)！目前預計 2026 年正式上映，接下來就讓我們繼續期待吧！

Photo Via : Netflix, Owen Cooper, Adolescence, IMDb, PEOPLE

全台灣最會穿正裝的人都在這裡 👔 ！

上次我們去大稻埕參與 SUIT WALK，攜手 BEAMS 和 UNITED ARROWS 兩大日系選品龍頭，在路上隨機街訪當天最時髦的人們！

不論是像方序中老師那樣搭配寬褲和金子眼鏡、像 Noa 恪守經典的雙排扣、像少白搭配銀色的夾克、或是像其他參與者搭配木屐、草帽、或是軍工裝外套，當天大家展現了各自對於「Suit」的詮釋，透過不同單品的碰裝搭配出個人特色。

你們最喜歡哪一個人的詮釋呢？歡迎留言跟我們分享！

#WazaiiiDigitalCover #曾莞婷 
無論別人怎麼看，我的碎片完整了我。
-
眼線勾勒出靈魂，曾莞婷坦言，「我以前是一個很害怕前進的人。」話鋒一轉，「但是現階段的我是個很害怕停滯的人。」從演員啟程，走到主持人、開啟副業，足以看出現在的曾莞婷不停冒出新的繁盛花苞，毫不停滯地期待被看見。

好的、壞的，她都留在身後，那是她的一部分，不曾消失。
-

人生本來就有不同的撞擊，無論好或壞一起從中學習成長吧！

因《影后》「潘茵茵」一角再度驚豔眾人，演技備受肯定，在此之前，曾莞婷已經度過整整兩年的空白期；問及她「不害怕被遺忘嗎？」她淡笑地說：「我覺得只要把自己準備好，一定會有讓大家記起來的一天。」

從鄉土劇一戰成名、經歷「轉型陣痛期」到再次破繭而出，曾莞婷並沒有放棄努力，反而放慢腳步，選擇好好充實自己，儘管一開始會沮喪、懷疑自己，但有一絲生機就該好好把握。從演員啟程，走到主持人、開啟副業，足以看出現在曾莞婷不停冒出新的繁盛花苞，毫不停滯地期待被看見。

「在放空的過程中遇到的人、看到不同的風景，會給人生有不同的收穫，然後讓別人看到更強大、更不一樣的一面。」—— 曾莞婷

若將人比擬成花，將生命歷程分作花期三階段：「發芽」、「 含苞」、「盛開」，我問她覺得自己在正處於哪一個階段？曾莞婷盯著鏡中的自己思索，靜默許久後回答，「我的真實人生應該是屬於盛開的狀態，但是我的演藝人生還在含若將人比擬成花，將生命歷程分作花期三階段：「發芽」、「 含苞」、「盛開」，我問她覺得自己在正處於哪一個階段？曾莞婷盯著鏡中的自己思索，靜默許久後回答，「我的真實人生應該是屬於盛開的狀態，但是我的演藝人生還在含苞的階段。」

關於現實生活，一路辛苦過來的努力，已經沒有留下遺憾了，曾莞婷說：「現階段我可以很真實的做自己，做自己其實蠻難的，這是需要很大的底氣，才能勇敢去做這件事情。我覺得現在的自己很棒。」

#Wazaiii #觀點 #interview @vicky_7155

你有多久沒有為美停留，沉浸在一場藝術展覽裡？

「大美不言」是國立故宮博物院、巴黎裝飾藝術博物館與梵克雅寶典藏精粹聯合特展，先前在台北故宮展出了為期三個月的珠寶與藏品，這次將展品移師嘉義故宮南院，Wazaiii 也南下，與幾位投身藝術的女性一同與美相遇。

這幾位女性分別是 TAO ART 創辦人 Vicky Chen 陳薇捷 @vichen8 、 TKG+ 藝廊 創辦人 Shelly Wu 吳悅宇 @shellywyllehs 、 Art TAIPEI 藝術總監 Viola Yao 姚妤萱 @violayao ，以及「炆久之芯WUNJO」創辦人 Patty Tsai 蔡依珊 @pattytsai13 ，Wazaiii 也透過她們的視角，觀看藝術與美麗的多樣性，聽她們娓娓道來欣賞展品的角度與豐富的感受。

📍更多專訪文章，請於 Wazaiii 官網，搜尋「大美不言」。

｜#Wazaiii奇女子故事沙龍｜台灣人，是什麼人？台灣的女性，又有什麼樣的豐富面貌？以《臺灣漫遊錄》拿下美國國家圖書獎的楊双子，用她溫柔的筆觸，寫下自己的答案。

台灣本土 + 歷史 + 百合女性情誼，這些看起來很小眾的文學類別，卻在楊双子溫柔的筆下延展出綿延無盡的燦爛風景，更因此站上國際舞台，引起文壇旋風。從《花開時節》、《花開少女華麗島》到《臺灣漫遊錄》，她以女性特有的視角，呈現過往本土風情，帶領我們思考身份認同，以及女性在不同時代與文化的定位，也進一步帶出，女人面對命運與重重困難，如何追求自我實現？

跟著達人視角，好好認識獨一無二的楊双子。

🔍完整文章搜尋官網：｜楊双子—《臺灣漫遊錄》吹響台灣歷史百合小說之聲，溫柔書寫屬於本土女性的歷史與自覺、望向未來｜

Disneyland March 2025 Tips! Spring break, daily fireworks, a food festival—all reasons to be excited for March!

✨ DISNEYLAND FIREWORKS – Daily fireworks return to Disneyland Park in March, but they won’t begin until later in the month. Catch Mickey’s Mix Magic with fireworks at 9:30 p.m. on March 1–2, 7–9, and 14–30 (subject to change, weather permitting). Prime viewing spots include near Sleeping Beauty Castle, along Main Street, U.S.A., near it’s a small world, and in Star Wars: Galaxy’s Edge by the Millennium Falcon.

🍔 DCA FOOD & WINE FESTIVAL – Disney California Adventure hosts its annual Food & Wine Festival all month long. Enjoy seasonal snacks, spot special characters, and even ride Soarin’ Over California, the original version of the attraction.

📼 ‘90s NITE – The sold-out event takes place March 4 and 6 at Disneyland Park. The park will close at 8 p.m. to daytime guests, but Disney California Adventure will remain open until 10 p.m.

🌟 @davidvaughn for more Disneyland tips!

Step into pure horror as Universal Orlando’s Epic Universe debuts its most terrifying ride yet! You’ll enter the eerie catacombs of Frankenstein Manor, where cutting-edge animatronics bring monsters to life like never before. 🐺 Four iconic creatures – Dracula, The Wolf Man, the Creature from the Black Lagoon, and Frankenstein’s Monster – lurk within these haunted halls. With 14 animatronics in total, each encounter will have you inches away from The Wolf Man’s razor-sharp claws and the towering 800-pound Frankenstein’s Monster.

🧛‍♂️ The attraction opens with the Epic Universe theme park on May 22, 2025! Secure your stay now with early vacation packages and be one of the first to experience Epic Universe!

#universalmonsters #wolfman #dracula #animatronics #UniversalOrlando #EpicUniverse #MonstersUnleashed #themepark

AM I DREAMING? 😱 I just hit 200K on here! I’m way overdue for an introduction, so here we go!

How did we get here? In 2019, I attended Disney’s D23 Expo with my sister. We had an incredible time, but I left wanting to be part of the magic at the next event. I had no idea how to make that happen, but the following year, I started posting content. Just before the next D23, I received an email from Disney asking if I’d like to create content at the event!

Walt Disney once said, “If you can dream it, you can do it.” These are words I live by, tbh. But I’m so far into this that I sometimes have to take a step back and appreciate it for what it is. Every time I do, I just feel overwhelmingly grateful and humbled. Thank you all for helping me reach this milestone. I’m forever grateful. Can’t wait to see what 2025 brings! 💙 David

My first Disney Wedding as a guest! The bride and the groom went down Main Street plus so many more incredibly magical moments in the morning. Congrats to the bride and groom, thank you for letting us be part of your magical day!

#disneyweddings #disneyweddingdress #disneywedding #disneybride #jndWDW2025

Disneyland will offer Paint the Night dining packages at Plaza Inn. Guests who purchase the package will receive a voucher for a reserved viewing area for the parade. While Disneyland has not specified the exact location of the viewing area, it is typically near the train station. Keep in mind that this is a standing area with no seating.

💙 Reservations open 60 days in advance for dates starting May 16. Disneyland has not yet announced the exact time bookings will become available. To book, search for “Plaza Inn Dining Packages” on the Disneyland app.

Donald’s Tales of Adventure Buffet at Storytellers Café – Join Donald, Daisy, and friends for a BBQ-style buffet filled with delicious eats and campfire vibes. Reservations open March 25.

Staying local for spring break and looking for activity ideas around New Jersey? NJ MOM’s got you covered with 20+ Spring Break Ideas that will make every day feel like a mini vacation.

Comment ‘spring break’ for the full list! 

🌊 Water Adventures
☀️Splash down the slides at DreamWorks Water Park @americandream or @acislandwaterpark in Atlantic City
☀️Explore the underwater world @adventureaquarium in Camden or @jenkinsonsaquarium on the boardwalk

🎡 Theme Parks & Indoor Play
🚜Ride into fun @diggerlandusa , @sfgradventure , or @storybookland_nj 
🤸‍♀️Jump for joy at trampoline parks or climb like a rockstar at indoor climbing gyms
🐰Go on an Easter-themed train ride @didonatofuncenter 

🐾 Animal Encounters
🦒Visit giraffes, lions, and more @officialturtlebackzoo or @capemaycountyzoo (free!)
🦙Get up close with adorable alpacas at a local alpaca farm
🦁Visit @popcornparkanimalrefuge Zoo to meet rescued animals

🌳 Outdoor Explorations
🚲Bike or hike through scenic trails and NJ’s best parks
💦Chase waterfalls at Paterson Great Falls or find hidden gems across the state
🌸Stroll through blooming gardens like @vanvleckhouseandgardens or Deep Cut Gardens
☀️Climb to the top of a NJ lighthouse for stunning views

Let’s get lucky with this Berry Lucky Spritz 😉 Try it at home and tag a friend you’d want to enjoy this with! 

Recipe:
1/2 Cup of Sliced Strawberries
3 Torn Basil Leaves
1 Tsp of Sugar
3 Dashes of Orange Bitters
1 Cup of Cooper’s Hawk White Wine
Handful of Ice
Soda Water
 
Steps: In a bowl, muddle the strawberries, sugar, basil, and bitters until well combined and no large pieces remain. Pour the wine, stir, and strain the mixture into a pitcher. To serve, fill a glass with ice, pour the mixture, and top with soda water. Garnish with fresh basil leaves and strawberry slices. Serves 2.

How did I do? 🤔 🐷 (sound on)

MY FIRST ATTEMPT AT CRISPY PORK BELLY on the bbq (but you can do this in the oven too)🤤 🐷 Beyonddddd proud of this one - may be the best yet!!

Method/Instructions - (this took around 4 hours) 

So I bought this 6kg piece of pork belly from @hixsonmeatldn - make sure it’s deboned to save yourself hassle. You want the meat to be one level so make sure to trim it up a bit 

Poke lots and lots of holes in the skin (I used a sweetcorn skewer haha) but just enough so it goes down into the fat - more holes the better 

Then make cross section cuts on the meat side and season/marinade* it however you want

*the marinade I used 

- 3 teaspoons garlic powder
- 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger
- 1 teaspoon salt
- Mama Sitas Tocino packet
- 1/2 teaspoons white pepper 
- 1/2 teaspoon five spice 
- 3-4 tablespoons soy sauce 
- 1 1/2 tablespoon olive oil
- 2-3 teaspoons mirin rice wine 
- 1 1/2 tablespoons rice vinegar 

Brush white vinegar over the skin before then letting it marinade overnight (skin side up), or 2 days in advance - leave it in fridge 

On the day of cook, take the meat out a couple hours before to get room temp. Preheat bbq/oven to 120° (I used my Traeger)

Then use cheap salt (saxa table salt) to completely cover the skin like a salt bake 

In bbq/oven at 120° for 2 hours, then about 160° for 30 mins (this was for a 6kg lump of meat). We did wait till it hit 66°C internal temp but continued to leave it for a bit so it’s not essential for this

Then take it out of bbq/oven, remove all the salt on skin - set grill to highest heat (or grill mode like we did) and put pork back in on the lowest rack- if the skin’s not oily already brush a thin coat of oil

Just keep an eye on it and the skin should puff up. If any parts look like they are burning after puffing up, tear some tinfoil to suit and cover them 

Let it rest for about 10/15 mins - cut and enjoy ✨

#porkbelly #crispypork #crispyporkbelly #pork #bbq @mamasitas_eu  @mamasitasrecipes #bbqporkbelly

Have you ever struggled with knowing who you are? 🙋🏽‍♀️ If so, you’re not crazy. You’ve been told lies your whole life.
 
The Enemy of your soul hopes you believe the lie— that you’re unworthy, unwanted, a burden to be loved, a failure, purposeless, and second place— so you live with a ceiling over your life stopping you from living the full life you’ve been created to live.
 
🚫 The Enemy knows who you really are. He knows how powerful your life is and how important your choices are, so he’s on a mission to make sure you don’t find out, too.
 
This is what he’s afraid of:
 
👉🏽 You knowing you are loved for who you are, not what you do, so you’re living your life free from finding your identity in the approval of others.
 
👉🏽 You knowing you are chosen for your family, so you’re showing up faithfully where God has placed you, even through hard times.
 
👉🏽 You knowing you are forgiven from your past setbacks and slip-ups, so you’re living without shame weighing you down.
 
👉🏽 You knowing you are valuable and have nothing to prove to people, because God’s approval is the only applause that matters, and you’re living a life of inner confidence and peace, even in the midst of outward chaos.
 
The Enemy cannot change who we are. He doesn’t have that kind of power. His best plan is to make us doubt who we are.
 
✨ The truth? ✨ You are more than you’ve been told. You are loved by God, chosen by God, created with a purpose and safe in the hands of God. And when you know who you are, it changes how you live…

Beginning days are special & sacred. I expected a couple, maybe a few hundred women to gather together, & no lie we had over 1,200 women walk through the doors on Friday. Wow.

For this first gathering… it was unnamed, & unbranded, a simple invitation to women who just wanted God. That’s it. I’m still in awe. It was stunning.

A powerful time of surrender, praying in faith, & shaking the room with praise! It was a beautiful picture of unity, true connection & immense joy. It was… God.

✨✨ So much love & gratitude to so many people who made this possible… to two of the most amazing leaders I know, my copilots and friends @pfmcpeak and @karlarenfro, I am so thankful for who you are and how you lead, on and off stage, it’s a JOY to get to do this together. Thank you @christineecrosby and @christyyaj for your beautiful attention to detail & powerful pivoting 😉 and to every staff member & volunteer that made this possible! 🙌🏽 Thank you to all of the women from multiple churches across the Community Church Movement (from LA, San Diego & Tijuana!!) who greeted, hosted & prayed over us… POWERFUL… I’ll never forget praying together! 🥹🙏🏽 Shout out to the beautiful worship band also comprised of leaders from multiple churches 🥹 and our powerhouse tech and production crew, making it happen from start to finish 🙌🏽 The most humble & joy-filled people I know. The room was saturated in the presence of God and the joy of the Lord. ✨✨

We will gather together again in the fall, and I will let you all know the details soon. We’d love to have you join us. Should probably have a name this time and will prepare for more people 😂

All I know is God is moving. He’s doing something new. He’s doing something now. And we won’t miss it 💛

Love continues to be my greatest teacher, and if I had to summarize the top lessons it’s taught me in 2023, they’d be this:

1. Aim to learn something new about your partner every single day. Loving them is learning them, consistently, and deliberately

2. Know each other’s insecurities and make it your mission to give extra love and attention to those areas

3. Make room for recklessness. Being a responsible adult is a full-time job with fleeting benefits. Find ways to comfort your inner child together

4. Questions are the gateway to connection. Find creative ways to explore each other’s brains and quirks

5. If adventure is a priority, have trips where you go strictly by an itinerary, and trips where you plan absolutely nothing

6. Laughter is medicinal. If you can find ways to laugh together, even in conflict resolution, everything else becomes 10x easier

7. Seek timeless wisdom. Through counseling, mentorship, or in the same educational programs. Learning is a sexy couple’s activity

8. Create unique traditions that you’ll either laugh or cringe at when you’re older

9. Document the small moments. They make for the most hilarious flashbacks in hindsight

10. Get matching onesies. Self-explanatory.

I know we’re still in the Honeymoon Phase (2nd year), but I just try to share all the real-time lessons I wish someone would’ve shared with me.

Is love on your vision board in 2024?

I give it 5-stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Song: “Luminary” by @joelsvnny

“You can’t crack what you don’t track” my friend @prince_ea once told me. So I’m always finding ways to process, reflect, and assess life through the lens of both the protagonist and the spectator.

Though I might go weeks without documenting, the minute I’m back, it’s like the pen never left my hand.
